mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NUM, MEMBER_NAME, DIV_NAME, RANK_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONE, MAIL, HIRE_DATE, RETIRE_DATE, BIRTH, ACCOUNT, BANK, PASSWORD, GENDER, PHOTO, BREAK_TOTAL FROM MEMBER JOIN DIVISION ON DIVISION = DIV_CODE JOIN RANK ON RANK = RANK_CODE WHERE MEMBER_NUM=#{memberNum} AND PASSWORD=#{password}

SELECT * FROM MEMBER JOIN DIVISION ON DIVISION = DIV_CODE JOIN RANK ON RANK = RANK_CODE

SELECT DIV_NAME , DIV_CODE , PARENT_DIV_CODE , CASE WHEN DIV_CODE = 'admin' THEN 2 ELSE DIV_LEVEL END DIV_LEVEL FROM ( SELECT DIV_CODE , DIV_NAME , DIV_LEVEL , PARENT_DIV_CODE FROM DIVISION

SELECT MEMBER_NUM , MEMBER_NAME , 3 "DIV_LEVEL" , DIVISION FROM MEMBER ) START WITH DIV_LEVEL = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR DIV_CODE = PARENT_DIV_CODE
